hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Market Mask Shop Item 4: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Deku Shield#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Shadow Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Zelda's Lullaby#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Skull Mask# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #3# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Din's Fire# and #a Bomb Bag#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Bow# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Weird Egg#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Barinade#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
